name: Design for a Marriage Window with the Seasons Spring and Summer
description: Design for a Marriage Window with the Seasons Spring and Summer; Daniel Lindtmayer (Swiss, 1552 - 1602/1607); about 1595 - 1600; Pen and black chalk and brown ink and gray wash, with color notations in black chalk; 39.7 x 29.7 cm (15 5/8 x 11 11/16 in.); 91.GG.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Design for a Marriage Window with the Seasons Spring and Summer
medium: Pen and black chalk and brown ink and gray wash, with color notations in black chalk
